alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 26 at 10:32AM EST until March 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Ohio, Butler and Muhlenberg Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 36.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 33.6 feet Friday morning. - Action stage is 34.0 feet. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
